description:
Fumi and her rival, Kanna, battle it out to decide who gets to play Cinderella in the upcoming school play. Thus begins a strenuous battle between the mean "Black Fumi" and the kind and pure "White Fumi."; Eventually, they decide to let Fumi, Yuki, and Kanna all be Cinderella. The family watches the train wreck in bewilderment; Bunji and three of his stupid friends cannot remember last night`s homework. This leads into being scolded but having fun as well; The four of them are crawling around in the sandbox at the park. They don`t mind the pain as they continue to romp around and have fun. Unfortunately, Bunji decides he wants his stupidity to surpass all the others and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: White Fumi, Black Fumi / Gala Occasion / Huge Mistake / Leader of Fools
白ふみちゃん黒ふみちゃん / 晴れぶたい / 大間違い / バカ大将
